duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient care in a medical-surgical setting, including assessment, planning, and implementation of nursing interventions.
Utilize clinical skills and critical thinking to deliver high-quality patient care and achieve positive outcomes.
Utilize healthcare informatics to document, track, and communicate patient information and treatment plans.
Manage time effectively, multitask, and adapt to changing patient needs and priorities.
Make ethical decisions in patient care and demonstrate professional conduct at all times.
